title: Filtering contexts and context instances
description: When you [search for contexts](https://launchdarkly.com/docs/api/contexts/search-contexts) or [context instances](https://launchdarkly.com/docs/api/contexts/search-context-instances), you can filter the results using fields and operators with the `filter` parameter. Specify `filter` either as a query parameter or as a request body parameter.
